show_name: I Can't Understand What My Husband is Saying: 2nd Thread (TV 2)
other_title: Danna ga Nani o Itteiru ka Wakaranai Ken 2-sure-me (Japanese)
I Can't Understand What My Husband Is Saying
No puedo entender lo que dice mi esposo (Spanish)
旦那が何を言っているかわからない件 2スレ目 (Japanese)
plot: Kaoru, a hard-working office lady,and Hajime, and hard-core otaku, just learned that they were having a child. However, their daily life still continues, along with their friends and family.
opening_theme: "Yuruganu Futari ~Ai no Sanka~" (ゆるがぬふたり～愛の讃歌～) by Kenichi Suzumura & Yukari Tamura
ending_theme: "Ii Kagen ni Shite, Anata (Acoustic ver.)" (いいかげんにして、あなた Acoustic ver.;Cut It Out, Dear) by Yukari Tamura & Kenichi Suzumura (ep 8)
